entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (exar_kun_intro_grenz.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_5: You defeated my minions. Well, not truly MY minions...we all follow the Voice from the Darkness. As shall you. Nevertheless, I remain unimpressed and shall ensure that you learn nothing more from me.
entries.s_6: You seek those liberated from the University's research outpost. Never fear, they have joined our glorious cause. You may join as well. Though perhaps, I will not allow you the choice.
entries.s_8: Begone meddler. This place does not concern you. Heed me or face my wrath.
entries.s_9: I am in the middle of something at the moment. Rest assured that I shall deal with you shortly.
